column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is the main graphical user interface and window manager.
is the graphical server.
displays information X
starts the graphical server.
a cli tool for screen adjustments.
is a property displayer for X
times out the screen if locked. (used in the lockscreen script)
sets the wallpaper.
provides window action utilities on the command line (maim).
allows for copying and pasting from the command line (used with mpv).
can take quick screenshots at your request.
is a suckless notification system.
is the monospace font of YARBS.
provides the sans and serif fonts for YARBS.
provides unicode symbols and emojis used in the status bar and elsewhere.
provides unicode and emoji symbols.
is the terminal I use right now.
is a pacman database extraction utility.
is a CLI system information tool.
is a lightweight terminal-based calendar.
can highlight code output.
provides system usage information and displays processes.
is an extensive terminal file manager.
is terminal text editor.
is a terminal browser which can also view images.
gives the dark GTK theme used in LARBS.
is a gtk3 color picker.
is used to set gtk themes.
is the status bar.
allows desktop notifications.
is used by i3blocks to display what song is playing on spotify.
is used by i3blocks to display what keyboard layout is being used.
is the screen lock.
is like dmenu, but only displays programs with a .desktop file.
is the audio system.
is an audio interface with ALSA.
is used to control audio with commands.
is an equalizer for pulseaudio.
is an audio controller.
does exactly what it sounds like.
is a suite of security-related network utilities based on the ssh.
doesnt need a description.
is a simple GUI calculator.
is an IRC client.
is an office suit.
is a simple GUI file manager.
is the text editor I use mainly. Its not free in any way.
is a simple torrent client.
is an image viewer for Wayland and X11.
is a terminal audio visualizer.
is the webcam app I use.
shows audio and video information and is used by ranger as well.
is simple video/gif player.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.
manipulates .pdfs and gives .pdf previews in ranger and other .pdf functions.
is a terminal browser which can also view images.
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.
is a game store.
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems.
allows management of FAT drives.
allows accessing NTFS partitions.
enables the mounting of cell phones.
is a GUI archive manager used by pcmanfm.
is a tool to (de-)compress archives.
is a tool to (de-)compress archives.
is a tool to (de-)compress archives.
is the microcode for amd cpus
configures CPU frequency scaling.
is a service to turn on NumLock in the TTY.
turns on NumLock when i3 starts.
is a driver for my motherboard.
